participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Tech-savvy and creative, with a passion for gaming and music. Sometimes struggles with social interactions.
participant_1.background: I sometimes have a hard time relating to people who don't share my interests. I just finished building my new gaming computer. I am bipolar. My best friend is in a band with me. I love the taste of mangoes, and they are a great source of vitamins and nutrients.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Artistic and friendly, enjoys connecting with others through music and photography.
participant_2.background: I have a powerful computer that can handle both the demands of wedding cake design and music production. I play the guitar to accompany my singing. I'm allergic to lactose. I enjoy capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera. I went to college.

content.text: Hey! I just built my new gaming computer!
I got the 3090 graphics card, the Ryzen 9 5900x processor, and 32 gb of RAM.
Nice! That's a pretty powerful rig.
Yeah, it's definitely overkill for gaming, but I also do some video editing and music production.
I see. I'm also a musician. I play the guitar and sing.
Oh nice! What kind of music do you play?
I mainly play folk music, but I also dabble in some other genres.
Cool! I like folk music. What kind of guitar do you play?
I have an acoustic guitar and an electric guitar.
Oh nice! I have an acoustic guitar too.
Great! I'll DM you my contact info.
